name: 服裝結構與製作（一）
restrict: ◎限本系(含雙主修)修習  ◎加退選階段需人工加選◎必須先修過【HGU0081  織物學】
goals: Able to draft three types of skirt flat pattern and one basic pants slope.
Understand the relationships between lower body and clothing construction.
Able to sew a piece of skirt and a pair of pants
Establish fundamental knowledge of clothing flat pattern making
syllabus:
**Week**

**Pattern making**

**Class activities or sewing laboratory**

1

Introduction: Class Regulations; Lower Body’s measurement;

Get familiar with industrial sewing machine

2

Basic skirt slope with one dart.

1) body measuring, 2.)Drawing the skirt pattern, 3)To learn machine threading and operating

3

Instructor examines and checks the accuracy of the basic skirt slope for each student.

Using the checked pattern and muslin to cut the basic skirt

4

Basic skirt slope with two darts

Hand sew the skirt and try on. Instructor will check the skirt fit for each student

5

1.  Learning single welt zipper
2.  Sew the skirt
3.  Learn the waist construction

6

Skirt pattern II

Learn seam types and hand stitches

7

1.  Seam type and hand stitches continue
2.  Learn and sew flat pocket

8

Skirt pattern III

 Invisible zipper

9

Trouser pattern

Learn and sew the side seam pocket

10

Instructor examines and checks the accuracy of the basic skirt slope for each student.

Using muslin fabric to cut the trousers

11

Skirt pattern IV

Hand sew the trousers and try on. Instructor will check the trouser fit for each student

12

1.  Instructor continue to check the trouser fit for each student
2.  Learn the pleats and gathering

13

Instructor check and discuss with each student for the personal project

1.  Flap zipper
2.  Sew up the trousers

14

Personal Project

15

Personal Project

16

Personal Project dues and Try on show

methodologies.note:
Lectures on 1) lower body’s characters and its relations to the skirt and pants construction, 2) flat pattern making for skirts, 3)flat pattern making for pants
結構原理
Students have to sew up a personal project at the end of semester
Various kinds of sewing laboratory to help students understand how to construct a skirt and a pants.
Instructor also adopts mix-teaching medium, including audio instructions and visual materials.
Instructor will demonstrate in the laboratory and correct each student’s pattern one to one.
